channel.title: Unrealeased Dreamcast port - inspiration?
channel.description:
I saw this video today... and although the visuals are not a scratch on the pc version of half life or black mesa I found a part of it really quite scary.
see below
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-dreamcast/videos/half-life-dreamcast-pc-port-trailer1[/url]
basically it's the scene of the doors opening and an alien grunt being right behind the doors... That image has burned itself into my brain and I would love to see that in an update of black mesa.
It would be nice to give the alien grunt a bit of limelight like this at some point
What do you think?

item.title: Unrealeased Dreamcast port - inspiration?
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
It’s as you get into the Lambda core, after you’ve gone down the main elevator and killed the black ops in the cargo area. After that you get to the main blast doors and this happens, loads of them everywhere. Then you meet the scientist after he opens the doors for you, the guy who picks the ‘short straw’.

Fuck I could walk you through every game without even looking, how sad!

But yeah, made me shit masonry when I first played it as a kid.
